name: Oversight costs
text:
(a)  The department's oversight costs shall be calculated at $100 for each hour of staff time plus actual expenses or one hundred twenty-five per cent of actual cost when contracting for oversight services.
	(b)  The department shall provide each requesting party or parties a summary of the oversight costs for the party's specific site on an annual basis. [L 1997, c 377, pt of §2]
